principles: Fusion: Casino Table warmth x IDE precision
Content: Data is King (Fibonacci numbers are the heroes)
Contrast: Deep Slate backgrounds vs Neon Emerald actions

buttons.primary: bg-emerald-600 hover:bg-emerald-500 text-white font-medium px-6 py-2.5 rounded-md shadow-lg shadow-emerald-900/20 transition-all hover:-translate-y-0.5 active:translate-y-0
buttons.secondary: bg-slate-800 hover:bg-slate-700 text-slate-200 font-medium px-6 py-2.5 rounded-md border border-slate-700 transition-all

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Force dark mode by adding 'dark' class to the html or body tag permanently.
3. LAYOUT: Use the 'Control Room' grid strategy for the main game view. The table is the stage.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to match the 'Slate-950' theme. Do not use default white backgrounds.
5. LOGIC: Ensure the 'Spectator Mode' toggle is clearly visible on the join screen.
6. GAMEPLAY: The 'Reveal' action must be dramatic. Use a slight delay or stagger for revealing cards if possible.
7. TASK LIST: Keep it in a sidebar (collapsible on mobile). Active task should be highlighted with an Emerald border.
8. TESTING: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, cards, inputs).
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
